source: Blog - Interviewing.io Reports, LinkedIn Engineering Blog, and Airbnb Tech Blog
module: Module 12: Final Industry Simulation + Feedback Report

level_1: Simulated interviews reduce anxiety: Candidates with 3+ mocks perform 2.5x better (Interviewing.io 2023 Data)
Basic structure: Code review (30 mins) → System design (45 mins) → Retrospective feedback
level_2: Top companies use rubrics: Google’s 4-point scale (1=Strong No, 4=Strong Yes) with explicit benchmarks
Pro tip: Record mocks to analyze body language and filler words ('um', 'like')
level_3: Meta’s hidden test: They evaluate how you handle hints during simulations (Adaptability Score)
Airbnb’s 'Super Mock': 6-hour simulation mirroring onsite loops with lunch break observation
level_4: Executive simulations: Netflix tests crisis response (e.g., 'Your system is down during peak traffic')
Research: Structured feedback increases hiring accuracy by 34% (Harvard Business Review 2022)

level_4: Two Sigma’s pressure test: Debug trading algos with live market data feeds
